name: EyeballJoin
_source: speak;Eirika;Alright, Lute...|You sensed some magic over here?
speak;Lute;Yes, it should be right over there.
speak;Eirika;What's... What's that? In the cage...
speak;Lute;Yes, I believe so.|And it's talking!|Amazing!
speak;EyeBoy;Ahhh, yes... Mogall.|That is what you humans call my race.
speak;Lute;You must be rather intelligent, fluent as you are in our language...
speak;EyeBoy;Knowledge is all I seek.|I would be out seeking more, if it wasn't for those blasted ruffians.
speak;EyeBoy;Yes, you see that Arena over there?|The blackguards that captured me are trying to sell me there.|I will most likely meet my end if I end up there...|Unless...
speak;EyeBoy;I can tell you two ladies are of high honor.|If you free me, I promise to lend you my aid.|My knowledge includes magic, after all...
speak;Lute;It seems quite a good deal, Princess.
speak;Bandit1;Alright, boys!|Let's get the eyeball and make some money!
speak;EyeBoy;Quickly!|Free me, I beg of you!
speak;EyeBoy;Thank you for freeing me!|Now let's get out of here!
speak;Lute;I look forward to hearing what knowledge you have!|I even have a great name for you!
speak;EyeBoy;Name? For me?|Hmm... yes, I suppose I don't have a name, in your parlance...|Alright, what is it?
text_entry;EyeBoyName;What did Lute name the Mogall?;force_entry
speak;Eirika;There is no time...|I'm sorry, but I don't know if I can trust you just yet...
speak;Lute;Quick!|They are almost here!|Maybe we can come back later?
speak;EyeBoy;...I fear it is too late for me.|Fine. Go...|I will face my fate with dignity...
